wClothesData.title: Floral V-Neck Midi Tiered Dress
wClothesData.desc: This floral dress from our Per Una collection has a tiered shape and full sleeves for a gorgeously floaty look. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with a flattering v-neckline and gathers on the bodice for extra shaping. Velvet piping trims create luxurious detail, while side seam pockets are handy for carrying your essentials. The hemline finishes at an on-trend midi length. Made with responsibly sourced viscose. Per Una: stylish designs crafted with carefully considered details and feminine flourishes.

wClothesData.title: Pure Cotton Printed V-Neck Maxi Dress
wClothesData.desc: Drift into the weekend with this elegant printed cotton printed dress. This maxi style is cut to a regular fit, featuring a detachable belt and adjustable drawstring waist so you can find your perfect fit. A tiered hem creates swishy movement, while the long puff sleeves give subtle volume. This dress buttons up through the front and is complete with a flattering v-neck. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
